metadata.title: CVE-2021-27815 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Deference in the exif command line tool, when printing out XMLformatted EXIF data, in exif v0.6.22 and earlier allows attackers to causea Denial of Service (DoS) by uploading a malicious JPEG file, causing theapplication to crash.

criterions.comment: exif package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
